support:
Support and development
for Node.JS projects
framework_note:
Node.js enterprise development framework, routing automatic mapping, perfect access control system, beautiful background. Integration of the most basic universal function:
System (organization management, user management, role management, menu management, timing tasks, database backup, IP access control, log log, etc.)
CMS (site management, column management, content management, advertising and links, etc.)
WeChat (member list, WeChat news, mass message, automatic reply, keyword reply, account configuration, menu configuration, etc.)
code_note: Nodeshop makes it easy to build custom, enterprise-grade Node.js apps. It is designed to emulate the familiar MVC pattern of frameworks like Ruby on Rails, but with support for the requirements of modern apps: data-driven APIs with a scalable, service-oriented architecture. It's especially good for building chat, realtime dashboards, or multiplayer games; but you can use it for any web application project - top to bottom.
shop_1_note:
NODESHOP

Enterprise's official website + online mall integration, build PC website + mobile phone website + WeChat full terminal coverage of the three in one site. Enhance the image of the brand and product at the same time, one-stop solution to the online ordering goods for the enterprise to build the best quality, the most practical solution to the construction site.
shop_2_note: Nodeshop is a set of Node.js technology based on the development of the mall system, enterprise application development framework, the site is used to display relevant results, technical cooperation or project cooperation can contact the author.
